Got Tensorflow 1.5.0 working for Linux Mint 18.3, CUDA 9.1 and cuDNN 7.0.5, built from source.
Make sure to append `--action_env="LD_LIBRARY_PATH=${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}"` to the build command  in case the build fails while linking :)
